meanings.definition: The state or quality of being dense.
meanings.sent1: The densenesses of the forest made it hard to see through.
meanings.sent2: The densenesses of the crowd made it difficult to move around.
meanings.sent3: The densenesses of the cake batter made it impossible to pour smoothly.
meanings.sent4: The densenesses of the fog enveloped the entire town.
meanings.sent5: The densenesses of the textbooks on the shelf made them hard to lift.

meanings.definition: The degree to which something is dense.
meanings.sent1: The densenesses of the fabric made it perfect for insulation.
meanings.sent2: The densenesses of the traffic caused long delays.
meanings.sent3: The densenesses of the puzzle pieces made it challenging to fit them together.
meanings.sent4: The densenesses of the stars in the sky created a breathtaking view.
meanings.sent5: The densenesses of the chocolate made it rich and decadent.
